name: Youtube - Hide Feedback Button
description: For those who have the new "look" of youtube, i don't know if there is an option to turn off this annoying button, that's why i use stylish anyway.
additional_info:
- Hides the Feedback Button on the "beta" look of youtube.
 - Yep, That's all, if you don't know what it is then disregard this style.
December 04 - Updated to hide the new "About the new look | Feedback" button.
